org.nasdanika.common

Interface Composeable<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AccessController, Context, Converter, MutableContext, ProgressMonitor, ResourceLocator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicDiagnostic, DefaultConverter, FilterProgressMonitor, NullProgressMonitor, PrintStreamProgressMonitor, ProgressEntry, ProgressRecorder, ReflectiveConverter, SimpleMutableContext, SimpleMutableResourceLocator

    public interface Composeable<T>
    Something that can be composed to create an aggregate. E.g. AccessControllers can be composed with AND operation, Contexts can be composed by chaining.
    Author:
    Pavel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T compose(T other)
      Returns a composition of this instance and the other with this instance being the first if the order of composition is important.
      static <T> BinaryOperator<T> composer() 

    • Method Detail

      • composer

        static <T> BinaryOperator<T> composer()
        Type Parameters:
        T - Instances of T shall implement Composeable.
        Returns:
        Composing operator which can be use in reducing streams of Composeables to a single composeable.

      • compose

        T compose(T other)
        Returns a composition of this instance and the other with this instance being the first if the order of composition is important.
        Parameters:
        other -
        Returns:
